chapter.title: What is PHP-GTK?
chapter.simpara: PHP-GTK is a PHP extension that enables you to write client-side, cross-platform GUI applications. This is the first extension for PHP of its kind, and was written in part to prove that PHP is a capable general-purpose language that is suited to more than just the web application environment.
This extension will not allow you to display GTK+ applications in a web browser. It is intended for creating standalone GUI applications.
